current.name: Creative Slide Titles? I Forget Anymore
current.description: I search through two corpora and attempt to analyze the attributes of "positive anymore", a rare usage of the word 'anymore' that doesn't include a negating word.

all.name: The Curious Case of Crosswords
all.description: In Teresa Pham's study, she looks into the world of crossword clues and analyzes intertextual references in both cryptic and non-cryptic clues in hopes of providing a proper analysis of crosswords as registers.
